title: Some more or less geometric sans caps
content:
Hello, hope you can help me with these...  
These are two different more or less geometric sans. I cant identify any of them, will be also happy with something close...

The third is a blocky geometric sans - I know what it is, it is a custom from these guys [www.g-b.at](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018234405/http:/www.g-b.at/ "www.g-b.at") but also looking for something similar...
